sentences.en: According to the system characterization, the executing proposal of the frequency controlling technique applied to coagulation pumps is presented.
sentences.cn: 根据该系统运行特性，提出变频调速控制技术在凝结水泵上应用的实施方案。

sentences.en: Airborne particles can also be changed in size and shape by coagulation with each other.
sentences.cn: 空气中悬浮的粒子,由于相互凝聚也会在大小和形状方面发生变化.

sentences.en: Azoth is often associated with the alchemical principle of coagulation.
sentences.cn: 水银通常与炼金术中的凝结原理有关.

sentences.en: Blood becomes stickier to help coagulation in case of a cut.
sentences.cn: 割伤的时候，血液会变得更为黏稠以助于凝结。

sentences.en: Coagulation is often invoked to explain these variations.
sentences.cn: 经常用凝聚作用来解释这种变化.

sentences.en: Disseminated intravascular coagulation ( DIC ) is a major complication of various severe diseases.
sentences.cn: 弥散性血管内凝血 ( DIC ) 是各科危重疾病的主要并发症之一.

sentences.en: Encounters of like charges act to diminish the coagulation rate.
sentences.cn: 同性带电粒子间的碰撞作用减少凝聚率.

sentences.en: Factors influencing the electrical coagulation process of hematite and quartz are described.
sentences.cn: 介绍了赤铁矿和石英电凝聚过程的影响因素.

sentences.en: Hemophilia: Hereditary Bleeding disorder caused by deficiency of a coagulation factor.
sentences.cn: 血友病: 一种遗传性出血性疾病,因先天性缺乏某种凝血因子而引起.

sentences.en: In the project produces oily dirt, dirt and fuel, chromic acid, lime etc scrap, decomposition leather coagulation fat.
sentences.cn: 工程中产生的油垢，污垢，以及燃料、铬酸、石灰等残余物，分解皮革的凝固油脂。

sentences.en: It is suggested that CP has significant anti - coagulation activity.
sentences.cn: 提示枝管藻多糖具有较强的抗凝血作用.

sentences.en: Man has been intrigued with blood coagulation.
sentences.cn: 人类一直对血凝感兴趣.

sentences.en: Objective To study the feature of disseminated intravascular coagulation ( DIC ) patients.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨弥散性血管内凝血 ( DIC ) 患者的临床特征.

sentences.en: The huge pool of blood in front of her was already assuming the iridescence of coagulation.
sentences.cn: 她面前那一滩血,已经凝结了起来,显出五光十色.

sentences.en: The more intense the source the more rapid the coagulation ensues.
sentences.cn: 源越强,随后发生的凝聚越迅速.

sentences.en: The replacement of methanol by ethanol for coagulation goves a good spinnability.
sentences.cn: 用乙醇代替甲醇作凝固浴介质可纺性能良好.

sentences.en: Water as coagulation bath, water law shape in the " funnel spinning. "
sentences.cn: 以水为凝固浴, 水法成形是在 “ 漏斗纺丝 ”.

words.tran_cn: [建][化工] 促凝剂；凝血剂；凝结剂
[助剂] 凝结剂；[化工] 凝结器
